snippet.title: The Grand Tour Game - Seamless Transitions
snippet.description: The Grand Tour Game takes you seamlessly between watching the show and then taking part in it – no loading, no buffering – you’re straight into the hot seat as Clarkson, Hammond or May. Watch as May struggles to work out the difference between reality and the game in the first of our sneak-peeks at the game…
